Html:
i have a  large collection of ebooks , which i use as a reference ..many on the same subject too ...so its hard to manage or search for specific terms without viewing many ebooks ..so i want to write an application which reads from all the books of under the chosen category and display me the results ..also ive another idea of creating a knowledge database like

 

ebook -> my app -> extract -> write in database -> query database for information ...

basically looking for a pdf parser

Use solr from apache
or Lucene.net
